Docs.summary: Represents the fonts installed on the system. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Drawing.Text.InstalledFontCollection> allows you to get a list of fonts families that are installed on the computer running the application with its <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection.Families%2A> property. For additional information on fonts and text, including example code, see [Using Fonts and Text](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/using-fonts-and-text.md).
Do not use the <xref:System.Drawing.Text.InstalledFontCollection> class to install a font to Windows. Instead use the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] `AddFontResource` function. An <xref:System.Drawing.Text.InstalledFontCollection> object sees only fonts that are installed in Windows before the object is created.
## Examples The following example shows how to get a list of fonts that support the regular <xref:System.Drawing.FontStyle>.
